attributes.action: Stop the privatisation of Nottinghamshires local authority residential homes for the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My gran (99 years of age Dec 20th 2009) moved into a local authority residential home in Nottinghamshire this year. There is a consulation process happening right now for the proposal to sell of all 13 homes. I oppose the sale on the grounds of quality, access, affordability, the right to choose, accountability, true costs v savings and viability longer term. Sign up and show your support to stop the sale of Nottinghamshires residential homes for the elderly.

rejection.details: Please contact the Nottinghamshires local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
